<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Living Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=2518) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've learned to use part of your form as a weapon. When you select this feat, you gain a claws unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage and has the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) and [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) traits; a horn, jaws, or tusk unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage and has the [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) trait; or a tail unarmed attack that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage and has the [backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173) trait. Each of these unarmed attacks is in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) weapon group. 

Your features are mutable; you can select this feat at any level, and you can retrain into or out of this feat or change the type of attack you gain.

**Special** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, select a new attack from the options above.

<title level="2">Living Weapon leads to...</title>
[Mutate Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=2522)
name: Living Weapon
